reviewText: Just seeing the gorgeous Bethany Lorraine makes this DVD worth every penny!

Playboy's Gen-X Girls is fifty-seven minutes long and was released on October 14, 1998. Basically there is no difference between the DVD and VHS version. The DVD version does not have the Babes of Baywatch preview and does not come with any extras. The DVD goes right into the show right away. The only thing The DVD does come with is scene selection. Your hostesses are Azalea Davila and Lauren Hayes. Those two are totally worthless throughout the video. They only talk about themselves and don't even bother to introduce the segments nor say who is in the segments It only at the end of the video do those two show any skin. Azalea strips down to her panties and Lauren is fully nude with the exception of her boots. At the end of the video they list three scenes and who are in them. At least two segments where clips from other Playboy videos and they were Hot Wheels and Deep Blue. Below is the name of the segments, who is in the segment (some, not all), and my comments.

Sister From Another Planet\Bethany Lorraine-Bethany starts off wearing a green outfit and quickly strips it off and becomes nude. She is fully nude for a few moments until she zaps on a red dress. For the remainder of the scene she switches back and forth from the red dress to being fully nude. In the next scene Bethany zaps on a psychedelic bra and pants. For the remainder of the segment she is fully nude 85% of the time.

Lock'er Up-Two ladies dressed in dominatrix clothes and the second one is topless. They both become fully nude and at the end of the segment go back to their original appearance.

Virtual Girl\ Shauna Sand-Shauna starts out fully clothed and after pressing a few buttons is wearing a bra, shorts, and jacket. She becomes fully nude and remains that way most of the time.

Rock Climb-Two Ladies climb a rock, get to the top, have sex, and eventually become fully nude.

Hot Wheels\Jami Ferrell, Kimber West, & Priscilla Taylor-All three ladies are fully nude 65% of the time. The scene was taken from Playboy's Fast Women.

Deep Blue\Karin Taylor-Full nudity in and out of the water 98% of the time. Scene is taken from Playboy's 1997 Video Playmate Calendar.

Touch T.V.\ Angela Hall & Anna Davidoff-Full nudity from the both of them towards the end of the segment.

Naughty Neighbors\Daphnee Duplaix & Karen McDougal-Daphnee and Karen bring a video to a single guy apartment. They both eventually become nude and turn the guy apartment into shambles and chase him around in the nude.

Model For Hire\ Jacquelyn Y. Caswell & Carrie Ann-The model comes to the loft and gets nude quickly. The photographer follows shortly and becomes nude.

If they got rid of the hostesses are if those two could have shown more skin this could have been a better video. Playboy's Gen-X Girls gets an AA++.
